ResourceHeader.Description: Inuvik (INUV) Magnetometer Station is located in Inuvik, NT, Canada. INUV is part of the UCLA GBO Network. Magnetic Latitude: 71.5 Magnetic Longitude: 272.90 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 10.2333 Magnetic Declination: 27.96 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CCGM online program with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CCGM online program with IGRF 2007
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically:S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the GMAG data
